Package neureka.ndim.iterator

Interface NDIterator

All Known Implementing Classes:
Permuted2DCIterator, Permuted3DCIterator, Simple1DCIterator, Simple2DCIterator, Simple3DCIterator, Sliced1DCIterator, Sliced2DCIterator, Sliced3DCIterator, SlicedNDIterator, VirtualNDIterator
public interface NDIterator
An NDIterator is used to iterate over n-dimensional arrays. Their implementations are based on specific NDConfiguration implementations which define the access pattern for a nd-array / tensor. This functionality is abstracted away by these 2 interfaces in order to allow for specialize implementations for various types of access patterns for various types of dimensionality...

    Defines if a new NDIterator is allowed to be a VirtualNDIterator.

  • Method Details

    • of

      static NDIterator of(Tensor<?> t)
      Use this to instantiate NDIterators optimized for the provided tensor.
      Parameters:
      t - The tensor for which an optimized NDIterator should be created.
      Returns:
      A new NDIterator instance optimized for the provided tensor.

    • of

      static NDIterator of(Tensor<?> t, NDIterator.NonVirtual shouldNotBeVirtual)
      Use this to instantiate NDIterators optimized for the provided tensor which may not be allowed to be a VirtualNDIterator instance.
      Parameters:
      t - The tensor for which an optimized NDIterator should be created.
      shouldNotBeVirtual - The enum which determines if a virtual iterator is allowed.
      Returns:
      A new NDIterator instance optimized for the provided tensor.

    • of

      static NDIterator of(NDConfiguration ndc, NDIterator.NonVirtual shouldNotBeVirtual)
      Use this to instantiate NDIterators optimized for the provided NDConfiguration which may not be allowed to be a VirtualNDIterator instance.
      Parameters:
      ndc - The nd-config for which an optimized NDIterator should be created.
      shouldNotBeVirtual - The enum which determines if a virtual iterator is allowed.
      Returns:
      A new NDIterator instance optimized for the provided NDConfiguration.
